00023 class SerialSocketSubSystem : public SubSystem
00024 {
00025     typedef SubSystem Base;
00026     friend class SerialSocket;
00027     friend class SerialSocketThread;
00028     friend class SerialSocketDataLock;
00029     friend class SerialClientSocket;
00030     friend class SerialServerSocket;
00031     friend class Os;
00032 
00033     public:
00034         SerialSocketSubSystem();
00035 
00036         static SerialSocketSubSystem* GetInstance() { return m_instance; }
00037 
00038         virtual const WCHAR* GetName() const { return L"SERIALSOCK"; }
00039         virtual void OnPowerUp();
00040 
00041         virtual BootSequenceState InvokeAt() const;
00042 
00043     private:
00044         static SerialSocketSubSystem *m_instance;
00045         static SerialSocketThread m_thread;
00046         static Mutex m_mutex_socket;
00047         static SerialSocketData m_sd[c_max_inet_socket_count];
00048 
00049         static SerialSocketData& GetSerialSocketData(UINT idx) {
00050             ASSERT(idx < c_max_inet_socket_count);
00051             return m_sd[idx];
00052         }
00053 
00054         static SerialSocketData* GetFreeSerialSocketDataEntry();
00055 };
